summary: Project to create a real HTML page

existing_features.title: Generate a standalone HTML file that includes all necessary inline CSS and JavaScript, making it fully self-contained and functional without external dependencies
Include proper HTML5 document structure with DOCTYPE, head section containing meta tags for viewport and character encoding, and semantic body elements
Create a functional demo page that showcases the Neroxa AI application's core features (chat, math solver, media generation, translation, music, art, code generation, games) in an interactive format
